text: Pertti Mattila (25 April 1909 - 9 December 1998) was a Finnish skier. He competed in the Nordic combined event at the 1936 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1909 births Category:1998 deaths Category:Finnish male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of Finland Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1936 Winter Olympics Category:People from Orimattila
title: Pertti Mattila (skier)
